snippet.title: Phil Mickelson loses bet with Augusta Masters patron, doesn't carry small bills to pay up
snippet.description:
Phil Mickelson loses bet with Augusta Masters patron, doesn't carry small bills to pay up by Brendan Porath on Apr 8 2014, 3:31p
Phil Mickelson has become the most beloved superstar at Augusta, and on Tuesday he relayed his latest amusing story of fan interaction and practice round gambling.

snippet.title: How to watch the 2014 Masters online, TV schedule, radio and more
snippet.description:
How to watch the 2014 Masters online, TV schedule, radio and more by Mark Sandritter on Apr 9 2014, 1:00p
Players are ready to tee it up for the 2014 Masters and while there won't be wall-to-wall television coverage, additional streams will give viewers multiple options to follow along.

snippet.title: Tiger Woods, citing back injury, will miss the Masters for 1st time ever in his career
snippet.description:
